title: Denpateki na Kanojo - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Drama   Martial Arts   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Seinen
tags: Absent Parents   Adapted to Anime   Crime   Living Alone   Male Protagonist   Serial Killers   Yandere
author: Katayama Kentarou
description: The story centers on a belligerent delinquent named Jū Jūzawa and a strange girl named Ame Ochibana who suddenly vows complete loyalty to him. 'Denpa teki na Kanojo' or literally, 'electromagnetic girlfriend,' refers to the denpa-kei sub-genre of stories imply that bizarre behaviors are caused by electromagnetic waves.>
